00020 #ifndef REVERSIBLE_VALS_H
00021 #define REVERSIBLE_VALS_H
00022 
00023 #include "backtrackable_memory.h"
00024 #include "nonbacktrack_memory.h"

00026 #include "../solver.h"

00028 // \addtogroup Memory

00035 template<typename Type>
00036 class Reversible
00037 {
00038   MoveablePointer backtrack_ptr;
00039   
00040 public:
00041   
00043   operator Type() const
00044   {  
00045     Type* ptr = (Type*)(backtrack_ptr.get_ptr());
00046     return *ptr;
00047   }
00048 
00050   void operator=(const Type& newval)
00051   {
00052     Type* ptr = (Type*)(backtrack_ptr.get_ptr());
00053     *ptr = newval;
00054   }
00055   
00056   void operator++()
00057   { *this = *this + 1; }
00058 
00059   void operator--()
00060   { *this = *this - 1; }
00061   
00063   Reversible(StateObj* stateObj)
00064   { 
00065      backtrack_ptr = getMemory(stateObj).backTrack().request_bytes(sizeof(Type));
00066      D_ASSERT( (size_t)(backtrack_ptr.get_ptr()) % sizeof(Type) == 0);
00067   }
00068   
00070   Reversible(StateObj* stateObj, Type t)
00071   {
00072     backtrack_ptr = getMemory(stateObj).backTrack().request_bytes(sizeof(Type));
00073     D_ASSERT( (size_t)(backtrack_ptr.get_ptr()) % sizeof(Type) == 0);
00074     (*this) = t;
00075   }
00076 
00078   friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& o, const Reversible& v)
00079   { return o << Type(v); }
00080 
00081 };
00082 
00083 class BoolContainer
00084 {
00085   StateObj* stateObj;
00086   MoveablePointer backtrack_ptr;
00087   int offset;
00088 public:
00089   BoolContainer(StateObj* _stateObj) : stateObj(_stateObj), offset(sizeof(int)*8)
00090   {}
00091   
00092   pair<MoveablePointer, unsigned> returnBacktrackBool()
00093   {
00094     if(offset == sizeof(int)*8)
00095     {
00096       offset = 0;
00097       backtrack_ptr = getMemory(stateObj).backTrack().request_bytes(sizeof(int));
00098     }
00099     
00100     pair<MoveablePointer,unsigned> ret(backtrack_ptr, ((unsigned)1) << offset);
00101     offset++;
00102     return ret;
00103   }
00104 };
00105 
00106 template<>
00107 class Reversible<bool>
00108 {
00109   MoveablePointer backtrack_ptr;
00110   unsigned mask;
00111   
00112 public:
00113   
00115   operator bool() const
00116   {  
00117     unsigned* ptr = (unsigned*)(backtrack_ptr.get_ptr());
00118     return (*ptr & mask);
00119   }
00120 
00122   void operator=(const bool& newval)
00123   {
00124     unsigned* ptr = (unsigned*)(backtrack_ptr.get_ptr());
00125     if(newval)
00126       *ptr |= mask;
00127     else
00128       *ptr &= ~mask;
00129   }
00130   
00132   Reversible(StateObj* stateObj)
00133   { 
00134     pair<MoveablePointer, unsigned> state = getBools(stateObj).returnBacktrackBool();
00135     backtrack_ptr = state.first;
00136     mask = state.second;
00137   }
00138   
00140   Reversible(StateObj* stateObj, bool b)
00141   {
00142     pair<MoveablePointer, unsigned> state = getBools(stateObj).returnBacktrackBool();
00143     backtrack_ptr = state.first;
00144     mask = state.second;
00145     (*this) = b;
00146   }
00147 
00149   //friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& o, const Reversible<Bool>& v)
00150   //{ return o << Bool(v); }
00151 
00152 };
00153 
00155 typedef Reversible<int> ReversibleInt;
